taskDescription:

    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>

    <mn>1</mn>
    <msup>
      <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
      <mn>3</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>

  <mtext>− 3</mtext>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>

  <mn>9</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{(8 - 1)^3}\, \text{− 3}\, \times 9</annotation></semantics></math>
